entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione burst inside the room and expressed her concern for Harry's disappearance.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron was annoyed with Harry's disappearance and shouted from several floors below.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry disappeared without telling his friends where he was going.

entities.name: mother
entities.description: Harry's mother is mentioned in the letter that Harry found.

entities.name: letter
entities.description: The letter from Harry's mother was torn and partially destroyed.

entities.name: photograph
entities.description: A photograph of a baby on a toy broomstick was found by Harry.

relationships.description: Hermione expressed her concern for Harry's disappearance.
Ron was annoyed with Harry's disappearance.
Hermione read the letter from Harry's mother.
Harry found the photograph of a baby on a toy broomstick.
Hermione searched the room for more clues about Harry's disappearance.
